title: BONUS EPISODE - Ray Harkins and Finn Mckenty talk the business of podcasting on The Punk Rock MBA podcast
itunes:title: BONUS EPISODE - Ray Harkins and Finn Mckenty talk the business of podcasting on The Punk Rock MBA podcast
description:
A special bonus episode of the podcast this week is a discussion I had with my good friend Finn Mckenty who runs a great YouTube/Podcast channel called The Punk Rock MBA. He had me on the show to discuss the business of podcasting and we get real deep on this subject. Considering I get a lot of questions about this, I figured it would be great to post this here. Thanks for listening! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
